## Frequently Asked Questions
What is ESPN Unlimited? How is it different from ESPN Select (formerly ESPN+)?
ESPN Unlimited is a direct-to-consumer streaming service that allows you to stream all ESPN networks and services, including: ESPN, ESPN2, ESPNU, SEC Network, ACC Network, ESPNEWS, and ESPN Deportes —in addition to ESPN on ABC, ESPN+, ESPN3, SEC Network+, and ACC Network Extra. With ESPN Unlimited you can stream over 47,000 live events from the best leagues and tournaments in the world, making it your home for the most and best live sports.
ESPN Select plan subscribers have access to ESPN+, with top-tier soccer, PGA TOUR, NHL, UFC, college sports, and a selection of other ESPN programming.
There are two available bundle plans –ESPN Select and ESPN Unlimited. Disney+ offers both within the following bundle plans:
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle](https://hulu.com/commerce/billing?pref=espn_unlimited_bundle)for the limited-time offer price of $29.99/month for 12 months\* (regularly $35.99/month), which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN Unlimited (With Ads).
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle Premium](https://hulu.com/commerce/billing?pref=espn_unlimited_bundle_premium)for the limited-time offer price of $38.99/month for 12 months\* (regularly $44.99/month), which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*\*), Hulu (No Ads\*\*), and ESPN Unlimited (With Ads).
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Select Bundle](https://hulu.com/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_bundle_trio_basic)for the price of $19.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN Select (With Ads)
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Select Bundle Premium](https://hulu.com/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_bundle_trio_premium)for the price of $29.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*\*), Hulu (No Ads\*\*), and ESPN Select (With Ads)
*\*New and eligible returning subscribers only. 18+.****After 12 months, plan auto-renews at then-current monthly retail price (currently $35.99/month for ad-supported plan or $44.99/month for premium plan) until canceled. Price subject to change.****Offer ends 1/5/26.*[Additional Terms Apply](#modal-additionaltermsapply-flagship).

What is Disney+ and how much does it cost?
Disney+ is a streaming service where you can watch movies, series, and originals from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, and more.
Access unlimited entertainment with Disney+ or Disney+ Premium in the United States:
* [Disney+: Disney+ (With Ads)](https://hulu.com/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_basic)for the price of $11.99/month
* [Disney+ Premium: Disney+ (No Ads\*)](https://hulu.com/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_premium)for the price of $18.99/month or $189.99/year
Save over 16%\*\* on[Disney+ Premium (No Ads)](https://hulu.com/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_premium&duration=annual)with an annual plan for $189.99/year
\*Ads will be served in select live and linear content.
\*\*Savings compared to 12 months of the monthly price of Disney+ Premium (No Ads).
What can I watch on Disney+ and where can I watch Disney+?
Disney+ is the streaming home for entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, Hulu, ESPN Select and more. With Disney+, you can choose from an always-growing collection of stories.
* New releases and timeless classics
* Exclusive new Original Movies and Series
* A limited selection of hit Hulu series and movies in the Hulu hub on Disney+.
* Select live sports, studio shows, and more from ESPN Select in the all-new ESPN hub in Disney+
* Exciting specials and limited-time streaming events
* Nostalgic throwbacks and past seasons of your favorite shows
* The entire Skywalker Saga and much of the Marvel Cinematic Universe
* Beloved and experimental shorts
* Documentaries, unscripted series, and so much more
The Disney+ app is available on mobile devices, web browsers, game consoles, set-top boxes, and smart TVs. Click to view a complete[list of supported devices](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-devices-supported/?utm_source=disneyplus&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ-where-can-I-watch&utm_content=supported-devices).
What are the different bundle plans available and how much do they cost? What additional plan offerings can I choose from?
Bundle plans include subscriptions to either Disney+ and Hulu, or Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN Unlimited, at discounted prices, as compared to the retail price of each subscription when purchased separately. Available to customers in the United States.
Choose between the following bundle plans:
* Disney+, Hulu Bundle for $12.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads) and Hulu (With Ads)
* Disney+, Hulu Bundle Premium for $19.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*) and Hulu (No Ads\*)
* Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle for $29.99/month for a year\*\*, which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN (With Ads)
* Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle Premium for $38.99/month for a year\*\**,*which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*), Hulu (No Ads\*), and ESPN (With Ads)
Additionally, you may also like the following plan offerings:
1. Hulu + Live TV plans
* Hulu + Live TV, Disney+ and ESPN Select for $89.99/month
* Hulu Premium + Live TV, Disney+ Premium and ESPN Select for $99.99/month
The Hulu + Live TV plans include 95+ live TV channels and additional on-demand content from your favorite sports, entertainment, and news channels you can watch at home or on-the-go. You will also get access to the content from Disney+, Hulu and ESPN Select streaming libraries. Access content from each service separately. Learn more and sign up[here](https://www.hulu.com/live-tv).
2. Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle
Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle plans include subscriptions to Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max, at discounted prices, as compared to the monthly retail price of each subscription when purchased separately. Currently, there is no annual subscription for the Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle.
Choose between the following Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle Plans:
* Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle (With Ads) for $19.99/month, savings of more than $13 per month. This plan includes Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max all with ads.
* Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle (No Ads) for $32.99/month, savings of $21 per month. This plan includes Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max all without ads. Ads will be served in select live and linear content.
With Disney+, you get new releases, classics, series, and Originals from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
With Hulu, you can enjoy current hits, comfort classics, award-winning Originals, and movies like FX’s*The Bear*and*The Kardashians*.
With HBO Max, you get access to HBO Originals, Warner Bros. films, the DC universe, and more like*Selena + Chef*and*House of the Dragon*.
*\*Ads will be served in select live and linear content*
*\*\*Savings compared to the then-current regular monthly price of each plan. Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle is an ad-supported plan. New and eligible returning subscribers only. 18+.****After 12 months, plan auto-renews at then-current monthly retail price (currently $35.99/month for ad-supported plan or $44.99/month for premium plan) until canceled. Price subject to change.****Offer ends 1/5/26.*[Additional Terms Apply](#modal-additionaltermsapply-flagship).
How and where can I access Hulu titles on Disney+?
If you’re a Disney+ subscriber in the United States, you can stream a limited selection of Hulu titles on Disney+. Access the Hulu hub on the Disney+ homepage to preview the Hulu on Disney+ experience.
If you’re a bundle subscriber or you subscribe to both Disney+ and Hulu (as standalone services with the same email address), you can stream a more extensive collection of Hulu titles on Disney+. You can use the Hulu hub on the Disney+ homepage to jump right into streaming some of your favorite Hulu Originals, series, and more. Click to view a[list of supported devices](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-devices-supported/?utm_source=disneyplus&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ-where-can-I-watch&utm_content=supported-devices).
Eligible Disney+ and Hulu subscribers can watch a wide variety of Hulu’s streaming library on Disney+. Certain Hulu titles are available only via the Hulu app. In addition, the Hulu app will continue to be the streaming destination for Hulu’s entire streaming library, all Hulu premium add-on content as well as any content associated with a Live TV subscription.
How and where can I access ESPN on Disney+?
Subscribers with any linked ESPN plan can now stream live content from ESPN on Disney+.
Once accounts are linked, to access ESPN content on Disney+, follow these steps:
* Open the Disney+ app or website
* Choose the ESPN icon on the Disney+ homepage to enter the ESPN hub
* You can also find select ESPN content by using the Search feature or by browsing the different rows on the Disney+ homepage.
* Once you’re in the ESPN hub, you can filter through Sports, Teams, Leagues, and Tournament pages. You can also search for any of those categories. Note —the sports content available to you to depends on your plan.
Not sure if your accounts are linked? You can learn about how you can authenticate with your pay-tv provider[here](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-access-espn-unlimited/?utm_source=espn&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=MLP-FAQ-activate-espn-unlimited&utm_content=access-espn-unlimited).
What are Streams on Disney+?
Streams is a new feature that carefully curates content from within the Disney+ app or provides access to live linear streams, such as ABC News, to give you a continuous streaming experience. This feature is available for all Disney+ and bundle subscribers. Learn more about what content you can watch with[Streams](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-streams/?utm_source=disneyplus&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ&utm_content=streams)at the Disney+ Help Center.

## Frequently Asked Questions
What is ESPN Unlimited? How is it different from ESPN Select (formerly ESPN+)?
ESPN Unlimited is a direct-to-consumer streaming service that allows you to stream all ESPN networks and services, including: ESPN, ESPN2, ESPNU, SEC Network, ACC Network, ESPNEWS, and ESPN Deportes —in addition to ESPN on ABC, ESPN+, ESPN3, SEC Network+, and ACC Network Extra. With ESPN Unlimited you can stream over 47,000 live events from the best leagues and tournaments in the world, making it your home for the most and best live sports.
ESPN Select plan subscribers have access to ESPN+, with top-tier soccer, PGA TOUR, NHL, UFC, college sports, and a selection of other ESPN programming.
There are two available bundle plans –ESPN Select and ESPN Unlimited. Disney+ offers both within the following bundle plans:
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle](https://hulu.com/commerce/billing?pref=espn_unlimited_bundle)for the limited-time offer price of $29.99/month for 12 months\* (regularly $35.99/month), which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN Unlimited (With Ads).
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle Premium](https://hulu.com/commerce/billing?pref=espn_unlimited_bundle_premium)for the limited-time offer price of $38.99/month for 12 months\* (regularly $44.99/month), which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*\*), Hulu (No Ads\*\*), and ESPN Unlimited (With Ads).
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Select Bundle](https://hulu.com/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_bundle_trio_basic)for the price of $19.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN Select (With Ads)
[Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Select Bundle Premium](https://hulu.com/identity/sign-up?pref=disney_bundle_trio_premium)for the price of $29.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*\*), Hulu (No Ads\*\*), and ESPN Select (With Ads)

What can I watch on Disney+ and where can I watch Disney+?
Disney+ is the streaming home for entertainment from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, Hulu, ESPN Select and more. With Disney+, you can choose from an always-growing collection of stories.
* New releases and timeless classics
* Exclusive new Original Movies and Series
* A limited selection of hit Hulu series and movies in the Hulu hub on Disney+.
* Select live sports, studio shows, and more from ESPN Select in the all-new ESPN hub in Disney+
* Exciting specials and limited-time streaming events
* Nostalgic throwbacks and past seasons of your favorite shows
* The entire Skywalker Saga and much of the Marvel Cinematic Universe
* Beloved and experimental shorts
* Documentaries, unscripted series, and so much more
The Disney+ app is available on mobile devices, web browsers, game consoles, set-top boxes, and smart TVs. Click to view a complete[list of supported devices](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-devices-supported/?utm_source=disneyplus&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ-where-can-I-watch&utm_content=supported-devices).
What are the different bundle plans available and how much do they cost? What additional plan offerings can I choose from?
Bundle plans include subscriptions to either Disney+ and Hulu, or Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN Unlimited, at discounted prices, as compared to the retail price of each subscription when purchased separately. Available to customers in the United States.
Choose between the following bundle plans:
* Disney+, Hulu Bundle for $12.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads) and Hulu (With Ads)
* Disney+, Hulu Bundle Premium for $19.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*) and Hulu (No Ads\*)
* Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle for $29.99/month for a year\*\*, which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN (With Ads)
* Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle Premium for $38.99/month for a year\*\**,*which includes Disney+ (No Ads\*), Hulu (No Ads\*), and ESPN (With Ads)
Additionally, you may also like the following plan offerings:
1. Hulu + Live TV plans
* Hulu + Live TV, Disney+ and ESPN Select for $89.99/month
* Hulu Premium + Live TV, Disney+ Premium and ESPN Select for $99.99/month
The Hulu + Live TV plans include 95+ live TV channels and additional on-demand content from your favorite sports, entertainment, and news channels you can watch at home or on-the-go. You will also get access to the content from Disney+, Hulu and ESPN Select streaming libraries. Access content from each service separately. Learn more and sign up[here](https://www.hulu.com/live-tv).
2. Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle
Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle plans include subscriptions to Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max, at discounted prices, as compared to the monthly retail price of each subscription when purchased separately. Currently, there is no annual subscription for the Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle.
Choose between the following Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle Plans:
* Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle (With Ads) for $19.99/month, savings of more than $13 per month. This plan includes Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max all with ads.
* Disney+, Hulu, HBO Max Bundle (No Ads) for $32.99/month, savings of $21 per month. This plan includes Disney+, Hulu, and HBO Max all without ads. Ads will be served in select live and linear content.
With Disney+, you get new releases, classics, series, and Originals from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
With Hulu, you can enjoy current hits, comfort classics, award-winning Originals, and movies like FX’s*The Bear*and*The Kardashians*.
With HBO Max, you get access to HBO Originals, Warner Bros. films, the DC universe, and more like*Selena + Chef*and*House of the Dragon*.
*\*Ads will be served in select live and linear content*
*\*\*Savings compared to the then-current regular monthly price of each plan. Disney+, Hulu, ESPN Unlimited Bundle is an ad-supported plan. New and eligible returning subscribers only. 18+.****After 12 months, plan auto-renews at then-current monthly retail price (currently $35.99/month for ad-supported plan or $44.99/month for premium plan) until canceled. Price subject to change.****Offer ends 1/5/26.*[Additional Terms Apply](#modal-additionaltermsapply-flagship).
How and where can I access Hulu titles on Disney+?
If you’re a Disney+ subscriber in the United States, you can stream a limited selection of Hulu titles on Disney+. Access the Hulu hub on the Disney+ homepage to preview the Hulu on Disney+ experience.
If you’re a bundle subscriber or you subscribe to both Disney+ and Hulu (as standalone services with the same email address), you can stream a more extensive collection of Hulu titles on Disney+. You can use the Hulu hub on the Disney+ homepage to jump right into streaming some of your favorite Hulu Originals, series, and more. Click to view a[list of supported devices](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-devices-supported/?utm_source=disneyplus&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ-where-can-I-watch&utm_content=supported-devices).
Eligible Disney+ and Hulu subscribers can watch a wide variety of Hulu’s streaming library on Disney+. Certain Hulu titles are available only via the Hulu app. In addition, the Hulu app will continue to be the streaming destination for Hulu’s entire streaming library, all Hulu premium add-on content as well as any content associated with a Live TV subscription.
How and where can I access ESPN on Disney+?
Subscribers with any linked ESPN plan can now stream live content from ESPN on Disney+.
Once accounts are linked, to access ESPN content on Disney+, follow these steps:
* Open the Disney+ app or website
* Choose the ESPN icon on the Disney+ homepage to enter the ESPN hub
* You can also find select ESPN content by using the Search feature or by browsing the different rows on the Disney+ homepage.
* Once you’re in the ESPN hub, you can filter through Sports, Teams, Leagues, and Tournament pages. You can also search for any of those categories. Note —the sports content available to you to depends on your plan.
Not sure if your accounts are linked? You can learn about how you can authenticate with your pay-tv provider[here](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-access-espn-unlimited/?utm_source=espn&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=MLP-FAQ-activate-espn-unlimited&utm_content=access-espn-unlimited).
What are Streams on Disney+?
Streams is a new feature that carefully curates content from within the Disney+ app or provides access to live linear streams, such as ABC News, to give you a continuous streaming experience. This feature is available for all Disney+ and bundle subscribers. Learn more about what content you can watch with[Streams](https://help.disneyplus.com/article/disneyplus-streams/?utm_source=disneyplus&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=homepage-FAQ&utm_content=streams)at the Disney+ Help Center.
